name: Chotu See-you-ass-thick
greetingText: I like your name, but I wanna have it attached to mine!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you My chotu beta!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text1: I know its your nakli birthday !
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
